entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
